amendment.description: To require the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Energy to report to Congress on acquisitions made by each Department of articles, materials, or supplies manufactured outside the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1705 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1705 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11541) To require the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Energy to report to Congress on acquisitions made by each Department of articles, materials, or supplies manufactured outside the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1705 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1705 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold.
